title: Brazil welcomes SL’s post-conflict progress
content: Brazil acknowledged the significant post-conflict progress made by Sri Lanka on many fronts and admired President Mahinda Rajapaksa’s success in combining economic progress with equity and human and social development.   This was stated by Brazil’s External Relations Minister Antonio Patriota when he paid a courtesy call on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Janadhipathi Mandiraya yesterday…
